name: ansispan
description: Change your ANSI color codes into HTML `<span>`s
readme: # ansispan [![Build Status](https://secure.travis-ci.org/mmalecki/ansispan.png)](http://travis-ci.org/mmalecki/ansispan) Copyright (C) 2011 by Maciej Małecki MIT License (see LICENSE file) Change your ANSI color codes into HTML ``s ## Installation npm install ansispan ## Usage ```javascript var ansispan = require('ansispan'); require('colors'); ansispan('green!'.green); // => 'green!' ```
